title: Riot Games, Can you guys help me with a problem I'm having?
body: Well I started playing on the North American server this morning I created my account correctly and at the time of putting the name of summoner I forgot a letter. Can you guys fix it for me? I wanted the name to become Fan of Bjergsen .. but I was wrong to enter the summoner name and became Bjersen Fan .. can you put the letter G in the name? I'm sorry if I created this blog in the wrong forum .. if you can help me I'll be very grateful .. thanks for the attention{{summoner:1}}

replies.body: It looks like the Summoner name Fan of Bjergsen was actually already taken by someone so that's probably why you couldn't get it. We won't be able to exchange those names unless you created both of the accounts, but if you did, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

will it be that instead of you by Fan of Bjergsen By Fan do Bjersen?
i'm from Brazil...here in Brazil is spoken fan do Bjergsen and not Fan of Bjergsen
